name: Domain Conflict
description:
~ Description ~

Two players battle for control of the domain. "3D"ish implementation in PICO-8.

Game developed for the Retro Jam 2017 in 32 hours with much love.

First Place Winner!

Cart page here.

~ Controls ~

C - Start

X  - Mute

Player1:

Arrow Keys - Move

Player2:

ESDF - Move

~ Credits ~
